Data Fields
device_uart_cfg_t Struct Reference
Stratify OS » Device Interface » Device Configuration

Data structure for a UART device (RX and TX lines) More...

#include <device_config.h>

Collaboration diagram for device_uart_cfg_t:

Detailed Description

This structure defines the data used to configure a device driver which uses the UART to communicate with the device.

Data Fields

u8 stop_bits
 The number of stop bits.
 
u8 parity
 The Parity (none, odd, or even)
 
u8 width
 The width of a UART word.
